about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for Castaway Station, composed and produced by Grey Orton (Zebra Vision Audio).

Dark electronic music textured with glitching orchestra and choir set a grim mood, with only the occasional glimpse of hope. The soundtrack for Castaway Station will transport you to an alien planet, and drop you right into the middle of this strange environment.
